title: The Incredible magic of magic
brief_description: Master magician, Bob Yorburg, stars and hosts ‘The Incredible magic of magic’, an easy to follow demonstration and instruction on two of the most well known and oldest examples of ‘close-up’ or ‘slight of hand’ magic. Complete with Bob’s magic tips these tricks can be performed using a few things found around the home. Suitable for persons 8 years and over.
